00025 class MainPage ( rend.Page ):
00026     """
00027     Handles site's main page
00028     
00029     This class handles qsos repository home page.
00030     """
00031 
00032     docFactory = loaders.stan (
00033         T.html [ T.head ( title = 'Main Page' ),
00034                  T.body [ T.h1 [ "This is the QSOS Repository Main Page" ],
00035                           T.p ["For now, you can ",
00036                                T.a ( href = 'repository' ) [ "browse" ],
00037                                " the repository or ",
00038                                T.a ( href = 'submit' ) [ "submit" ],
00039                                " an evaluation. "
00040                                 ]
00041                  ],
00042                ]
00043         )
00044 
00045     children = {
00046                 'repository'    : browse.MainPage(),
00047                 'submit'        : submit.UploadPage()
00048                 }
